channel.title: Web-Ui on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Web-Ui on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: Showing tool calls and other improvements to Copilot chat on the web
item.description:
GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com now shows tool call details in chat responses and includes additional performance and UX improvements.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Improved file navigation and editing in the web UI
item.description:
GitHub announced improvements to the web UI to make file navigation and editing faster and simpler. A highlighted change is seamless editing from search results so that search hits link directly to files with the ability to open and edit them in the web editor.

  • Source: GitHub
